Posts.EditableText:
I imported a sound file to my game, which turned out to be 38 mb.
I removed the script which called for it to play, but now when I export it the game file is still 38mb, so I assume the files still in there increasing the file size.

How do I remove it?
thanks.
Posts.HTML:
I imported a sound file to my game, which turned out to be 38 mb.
I removed the script which called for it to play, but now when I export it the game file is still 38mb, so I assume the files still in there increasing the file size.

How do I remove it?
thanks.

Posts.EditableText: If you add a sound file to your game, it is copied into your directory. You must delete this file from your game directory
Posts.HTML: If you add a sound file to your game, it is copied into your directory. You must delete this file from your game directory
